sentence: Stephen Colbert offered a “miracle” cure to Dr. Mehmet Oz for his not-so-great Pennsylvania Senate-run poll numbers: a supplement that “makes you more likable and electable while reducing belly fat.” “Why is Dr. Oz losing so badly?” Colbert, asked Friday night in his “The Late Show” monologue.
author: Harper Lambert
title: Stephen Colbert Has a ‘Miracle’ Cure for Dr. Oz’s Shaky Senate Campaign That’s Rather Tough to Swallow (Video)

sentence: I felt the need to write this letter to encourage Pennsylvania voters not to vote for Dr. Mehmet Oz.
title: Letter to the editor: Don't vote for Dr. Oz

sentence: Thanks a lot, Joe.pic.twitter.com/8kNil6upn8 — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@Dr. Mehmet Oz) 1649281493 And here comes the Biden slam (if you could even call it that)... "We got Joe Biden to thank for this.
title: Dr Oz roasted for 'phony' grocery store shopping video

author: Jim Hoft
title: New Jersey Schools to Teach First and Second Graders About “Gender Identity” and “Climate Change” in Fall
